contentItemData.label: Documentation Index
contentItemData.description: Provides an overview and hyperlinks to all packaged documentation.

contentItemData.label: AN718: Manufacturing Test Overview
contentItemData.description: Provides a high-level description of the different options for integrating RF testing and characterization into standard test flows. It is intended for customers who are moving from the early prototype development stage to the manufacturing production environment and need assistance with manufacturing test.

contentItemData.label: UG103.01: Wireless Networking Fundamentals
contentItemData.description: Introduces some fundamental concepts of wireless networking. These concepts are referred to in other Fundamentals documents. If you are new to wireless networking, you should read this document first.

contentItemData.label: UG103.06: Bootloader Fundamentals
contentItemData.description: Introduces bootloading for Silicon Labs networking devices. Discusses the Gecko Bootloader as well as legacy Ember and Bluetooth bootloaders, and describes the file formats used by each.

contentItemData.label: UG103.11: Thread Fundamentals
contentItemData.description: Includes a brief background on the emergence of Thread, provides a technology overview, and describes some key features of Thread to consider when implementing a Thread solution.

contentItemData.label: AN1256: Using the Silicon Labs RCP with the OpenThread Border Router
contentItemData.description: Describes using the OpenThread Border Router GitHub repository and the Silicon Labs OpenThread Radio Co-Processor (RCP) application to create a Thread Border Router.

contentItemData.label: UG103.16: Multiprotocol Fundamentals
contentItemData.description: Describes the four multiprotocol modes, discusses considerations when selecting protocols for multiprotocol implementations, and reviews the Radio Scheduler, a required component of a dynamic multiprotocol solution.

contentItemData.label: UG305: Dynamic Multiprotocol User's Guide
contentItemData.description: Describes how to implement a dynamic multiprotocol solution.

contentItemData.label: Silicon Labs OpenThread Release Notes
contentItemData.description: Lists compatibility requirements and sources for all software components in the development environment. Discusses the latest changes to the Silicon Labs OpenThread stack (and associated utilities) including added/deleted/deprecated features/API, and lists bugs that have been fixed since the last release and any pending ones.

contentItemData.label: UG266: Silicon Labs Gecko Bootloader User's Guide
contentItemData.description: Describes the high-level implementation of the Silicon Labs Gecko Bootloader for EFR32 SoCs and NCPs, and provides information on how to get started using the Gecko Bootloader with Silicon Labs wireless protocol stacks.

contentItemData.label: AN1142: Mesh Network Performance Comparison
contentItemData.description: Reviews the Zigbee, Thread, and Bluetooth mesh networks to evaluate their differences in performance and behavior.

contentItemData.label: AN1218: Series 2 Secure Boot with RTSL
contentItemData.description: Contains detailed information on configuring and using the Secure Boot with hardware Root of Trust and Secure Loader on Series 2 devices, including how to provision the signing key. This is a companion document to UG266: Silicon Labs Gecko Bootloader User's Guide.

contentItemData.label: AN700.1: Manufacturing Test Guidelines for the EFR32
contentItemData.description: Details the different options for integrating RF testing and characterization into standard test flows.

contentItemData.label: Silicon Labs OpenThread API Reference Guide
contentItemData.description: Contains a comprehensive list of APIs used to interface to the Silicon Labs OpenThread stack.

contentItemData.label: AN1265: Dynamic Multiprotocol Development with Bluetooth and OpenThread in GSDK v3.x
contentItemData.description: Provides details on developing Dynamic Multiprotocol applications using Bluetooth and OpenThread.

contentItemData.label: UG162: Simplicity Commander Reference Guide
contentItemData.description: Describes how and when to use Simplicity Commander's Command-Line Interface. Only EFR32 is currently supported. EM3xx is not supported at this time.

contentItemData.label: QSG170: Silicon Labs OpenThread Quick Start Guide
contentItemData.description: Provides basic information on configuring, building, and installing applications using the Silicon Labs OpenThread stack.

contentItemData.label: Gecko Platform Release Notes
contentItemData.description: A detailed overview of all the changes, additions, and fixes in the Gecko Platform components. The Gecko Platform includes: EMLIB, EMDRV, RAIL Library, NVM3, and the component-based infrastructure.

contentItemData.label: UG103.07: Non-Volatile Data Storage Fundamentals
contentItemData.description: Introduces non-volatile data storage using flash and the three different storage implementations offered for Silicon Labs microcontrollers and SoCs: Simulated EEPROM, PS Store, and NVM3.

contentItemData.label: AN1141: Thread Mesh Network Performance
contentItemData.description: Details methods for testing Thread mesh network performance; results are intended to provide guidance on design practices and principles as well as expected field performance results.

contentItemData.label: AN1135: Using Third Generation Non-Volatile Memory (NVM3) Data Storage
contentItemData.description: Explains how NVM3 can be used as non-volatile data storage in various protocol implementations.
